name: SkyTuner
0:
”Alexa, open sky tuner”
”Alexa, ask sky tuner for the pressure gradient”
”Alexa, ask sky tuner for north boulder”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sky tuner
Developer Terms of Use
des: Sky Tuner is a wind talker and weather information skill for hangglider and paraglider pilots in the Boulder, Colorado area. There are over a dozen stations you can listen to that provide near real time wind information. You can also check various weather sources such as the local soaring forecast, pressure gradient and winds aloft. Echo devices with a screen can view various weather maps and webcams. After you open Sky Tuner, ask for the "Station List" to get started.
